body:
Hello.
I have decided to make an Avicus community montage. Basically, players can send their clips to avicuscommunitymontage@gmail.com where I will put the best clips into a montage. The clips must be ON avicus.
Things I am looking for:

Scrim/Tournament Clips

Amazing Kills

Good Monuments

Other skills such as MLG water drops, ladder drops, breezily bridging, ETC.

A good song to use. Troll suggestions will be removed.

All clips MUST be in raw form.


Good luck :)

I'll announce when I have enough clips
